Build 2.0.451.material.250516-1647
This article is about a future project by Horibyte, information may change over time.

Project Arctic

Project Arctic¹ is an unreleased operating system by Horibyte originally ““announced”” on Early 2024².
A lot of references to Arctic have been in Horibyte’s messages and works to the point of making a mockup of said OS in 2024…before a Horibyte moment interrupted the process.

The OS’ kernel has been compiled 2 total times in early 2025 but never has been publicly shared by Horibyte due to them losing the kernel.bin file(s).

¹↑ Also known as Horibyte LeafyOS
²↑ Due to multiple resources announcing Project Arctic, the exact announcement date is unknown, Early 2024 is an estimate.
